name: Elizabeth Mattijsen
bio: Developer in 🦋, 🐪, and many other (mostly now defunct) [programming languages](https://www.amazon.com/Friendly-Orange-Glow-Untold-Cyberculture/dp/1101871555), [Rakudo Perl 6 contributor](https://github.com/rakudo/rakudo/graphs/contributors) and writer of [Perl 6 Weekly](https://p6weekly.wordpress.com).
